00033 typedef struct {
00034   char corefname[255];
00035   char corefmd5hash[255];
00036   SlaterDet* core;
00037   int* ng;
00038   int* idx;
00039   int* xi;              
00040 } CoreFMDInternals;

00043 Parameterization ParameterizationCoreFMD = {
00044   name : "CoreFMD",
00045   Pararead : CoreFMDread,
00046   Parawrite : CoreFMDwrite,
00047   Paraclone : CoreFMDclone,
00048   ParainitSlaterDet : CoreFMDinitSlaterDet,
00049   ParatoSlaterDet : CoreFMDtoSlaterDet,
00050   ParaprojectgradSlaterDet : CoreFMDprojectgradSlaterDet

00054 // number of parameters for Core
00055 #define NCORE 3
00056 
00057 // number of real parameter of a Gaussian
00058 #define NGAUSS 12

00061 void CoreFMDclone(const Para* q, Para* qp)
00062 {
00063   int i;
00064 
00065   strcpy(qp->name, q->name);
00066   qp->A = q->A; qp->Z = q->Z; qp->N = q->N;
00067   qp->n = q->n;
00068 
00069   qp->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00070   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00071     qp->x[i] = q->x[i];
00072 
00073   qp->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00074   qp->internals = malloc(sizeof(CoreFMDInternals));
00075   CoreFMDInternals *qpint = qp->internals;
00076   CoreFMDInternals *qint = q->internals;
00077 
00078   strcpy(qpint->corefname, qint->corefname);
00079   strcpy(qpint->corefmd5hash, qint->corefmd5hash);
00080 
00081   qpint->core = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00082   cloneSlaterDet(qint->core, qpint->core);
00083 
00084   qpint->ng = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00085   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00086     qpint->ng[i] = qint->ng[i];
00087   qpint->idx = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00088   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00089     qpint->idx[i] = qint->idx[i];
00090   qpint->xi = malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00091   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
00092     qpint->xi[i] = qint->xi[i];
00093 
00094 }

00097 #define BUFSIZE 255
00098 
00099 int CoreFMDread(FILE* fp, Para* q)
00100 {
00101   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00102   int i;
00103   CoreFMDInternals* qint;
00104 
00105   qint = q->internals = malloc(sizeof(CoreFMDInternals));
00106   qint->core = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00107                                         
00108   do
00109     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00110   while (strncmp(buf, "<Para ", 5) && !feof(fp));
00111   if (feof(fp)) {
00112     fprintf(stderr, "did't find <Para ...>\n");
00113     return -1;
00114   }
00115   
00116   char Pname[80], qname[80];
00117 
00118   sscanf(buf, "<Para %s %s>", Pname, qname);
00119   if (strcmp(Pname, "CoreFMD")) {
00120     fprintf(stderr, "not a CoreFMD parameter set\n");
00121     return -1;
00122   }
00123   strcpy(q->name, stripstr(qname, ">"));
00124 
00125   // read core
00126   double corepos[3];
00127 
00128   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00129   sscanf(buf, "<Core (%lf, %lf, %lf) %s %s>",
00130          &corepos[0], &corepos[1], &corepos[2],
00131          qint->corefname, qint->corefmd5hash);
00132   if (strncmp(qint->corefmd5hash, md5hash(qint->corefname), 32)) {
00133     fprintf(stderr, "...  SlaterDetFile does not match with existing hash\n");
00134     return -1;
00135   }
00136   readSlaterDetfromFile(qint->core, qint->corefname);
00137 
00138   // read nucleon parameters
00139   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00140   if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d %d", &q->A, &q->Z, &q->N) != 3) {
00141     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00142     return -1;
00143   }
00144   if (q->A != q->Z+q->N) {
00145     fprintf(stderr, "proton and neutron number don't sum up in line\n>>%s<<\n",
00146             stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00147     return -1;
00148   }
00149   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00150   if (sscanf(buf, "%d", &q->ngauss) != 1) {
00151     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00152     return -1;
00153   }
00154 
00155   qint->idx = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00156   qint->ng = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00157   qint->xi = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00158   for (i=0; i<q->A; i++) {
00159     qint->idx[i] = 0;
00160     qint->ng[i] = 0;
00161     qint->xi[i] = 0;
00162   }
00163   
00164   q->n = q->ngauss*NGAUSS+NCORE;
00165 
00166   q->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00167 
00168   q->x[0] = corepos[0]; q->x[1] = corepos[1]; q->x[2] = corepos[2];
00169 
00170   int k, xi;
00171   double chi0re, chi0im, chi1re, chi1im;
00172   double are, aim, b0re, b0im, b1re, b1im, b2re, b2im; 
00173   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
00174     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00175     if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d "
00176                "(%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf)", 
00177                &k, &xi, &chi0re, &chi0im, &chi1re, &chi1im, 
00178                &are, &aim, &b0re, &b0im, &b1re, &b1im, &b2re, &b2im) != 14) {
00179       fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", 
00180               stripstr(buf,"\n"));
00181       return -1;
00182     }
00183     qint->ng[k]++;
00184     qint->xi[k] = xi;
00185     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0+NCORE] = chi0re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1+NCORE] = chi0im;
00186     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2+NCORE] = chi1re; q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3+NCORE] = chi1im;
00187     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4+NCORE] = are;    q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5+NCORE] = aim;
00188     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6+NCORE] = b0re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7+NCORE] = b0im;
00189     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8+NCORE] = b1re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9+NCORE] = b1im;
00190     q->x[i*NGAUSS+10+NCORE] = b2re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+11+NCORE] = b2im;
00191   }     
00192   for (k=1; k<q->A; k++) 
00193     qint->idx[k] = qint->idx[k-1]+qint->ng[k-1];
00194 
00195   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00196   if (strncmp(buf, "</Para>", 7)) {
00197     fprintf(stderr, "didn't find </Para>\n");
00198     return -1;
00199   }     
00200 
00201   return 0;
00202 }

00205 int CoreFMDwrite(FILE* fp, const Para* q)
00206 {
00207   int k, ki, i;
00208   CoreFMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00209 
00210   fprintf(fp, "<Para CoreFMD %s>\n", q->name);
00211 
00212   fprintf(fp, "<Core (%12.8f, %12.8f, %12.8f) %s %s\n", 
00213           q->x[0], q->x[1], q->x[2],
00214           qint->corefname, qint->corefmd5hash);
00215 
00216   fprintf(fp, "%d %d %d\n", q->A, q->Z, q->N);
00217   fprintf(fp, "%d\n", q->ngauss);
00218 
00219   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00220     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++) {
00221       i = qint->idx[k]+ki;
00222       fprintf(fp,
00223               "%2d  %+2d  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)\n",
00224               k, qint->xi[k],
00225               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0+NCORE], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1+NCORE],
00226               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2+NCORE], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3+NCORE],
00227               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4+NCORE], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5+NCORE],
00228               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6+NCORE], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7+NCORE],
00229               q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8+NCORE], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9+NCORE],
00230               q->x[i*NGAUSS+10+NCORE], q->x[i*NGAUSS+11+NCORE]);
00231   }
00232   fprintf(fp, "</Para>\n");
00233 
00234   return 0;
00235 }

00238 void CoreFMDinitSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00239 {
00240   int k, ki;
00241   CoreFMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00242 
00243   Q->A = qint->core->A + q->A; 
00244   Q->Z = qint->core->Z + q->Z; 
00245   Q->N = qint->core->N + q->N;
00246   Q->ngauss = qint->core->ngauss + q->ngauss;
00247 
00248   Q->idx = (int*) malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00249   for (k=0; k<qint->core->A; k++)
00250     Q->idx[k] = qint->core->idx[k];
00251   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00252     Q->idx[qint->core->A + k] = qint->idx[k] + qint->core->ngauss;
00253 
00254   Q->ng = (int*) malloc(Q->A*sizeof(int));
00255   for (k=0; k<qint->core->A; k++)
00256     Q->ng[k] = qint->core->ng[k];
00257   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00258     Q->ng[qint->core->A + k] = qint->ng[k];
00259 
00260   Q->G = (Gaussian*) malloc(Q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian));
00261   for (k=0; k<qint->core->A; k++) 
00262     for (ki=0; ki<qint->core->ng[k]; ki++)
00263       Q->G[qint->core->idx[k]+ki].xi = qint->core->G[k].xi; 
00264   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++) 
00265     for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++)
00266       Q->G[qint->core->ngauss + qint->idx[k]+ki].xi = qint->xi[k]; 
00267 }
00268 
00269 
00270 void CoreFMDtoSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00271 {
00272   CoreFMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00273   int ngc = qint->core->ngauss;
00274 
00275   int i;
00276 
00277   // the core
00278   for (i=0; i<ngc; i++) {
00279     Q->G[i] = qint->core->G[i];
00280     moveGaussian(&Q->G[i], q->x);
00281   }
00282 
00283   // the nucleons
00284   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
00285     Q->G[ngc+i].chi[0] = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0+NCORE] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1+NCORE];
00286     Q->G[ngc+i].chi[1] = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2+NCORE] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3+NCORE];
00287     Q->G[ngc+i].a      = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4+NCORE] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5+NCORE];
00288     Q->G[ngc+i].b[0]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6+NCORE] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 7+NCORE];
00289     Q->G[ngc+i].b[1]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 8+NCORE] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 9+NCORE];
00290     Q->G[ngc+i].b[2]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+10+NCORE] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+11+NCORE];
00291   }
00292 }
00293 
00294 
00295 void CoreFMDprojectgradSlaterDet(const Para* q,
00296                                       const gradSlaterDet* dQ, double* dq)
00297 {
00298   CoreFMDInternals* qint = q->internals;
00299   int ngc = qint->core->ngauss;
00300   int i,k;
00301 
00302   // gradients with respect to core
00303   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00304     dq[i] = 0.0;
00305 
00306   for (k=0; k<qint->core->ngauss; k++)
00307     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00308       dq[i] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[k].b[i]);
00309 
00310   // gradients with respect to nucleons
00311 
00312   for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
00313     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 0+NCORE] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[ngc+i].chi[0]);
00314     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 1+NCORE] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[ngc+i].chi[0]);
00315     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 2+NCORE] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[ngc+i].chi[1]);
00316     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 3+NCORE] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[ngc+i].chi[1]);
00317     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 4+NCORE] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[ngc+i].a);
00318     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 5+NCORE] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[ngc+i].a);
00319     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 6+NCORE] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[ngc+i].b[0]);
00320     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 7+NCORE] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[ngc+i].b[0]);
00321     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 8+NCORE] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[ngc+i].b[1]);
00322     dq[i*NGAUSS+ 9+NCORE] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[ngc+i].b[1]);
00323     dq[i*NGAUSS+10+NCORE] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[ngc+i].b[2]);
00324     dq[i*NGAUSS+11+NCORE] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[ngc+i].b[2]);
00325   }
00326 }
